title: More Snakes Added To U.S. Banned Species List
teaser: After banning the importation and sale of Burmese pythons and similar species, federal officials are taking aim at boa constrictors and 4 species of anacondas. Breeders and retailers are hissing mad.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
